name: Spark Of Destiny Early Access
description:
Spark of Destiny is a pixel art 2d rpg adventure made by 2 students just starting in video game programming.           

                                                

You can support us by donating the amount you want. The game will be updated frequently. This would greatly help us to improve the content and encourage us to progress.

For the story : In a world ravaged by chaos caused by a supernatural event , you play a young adventurer whose only goal is to save his little sister from a deadly disease. There is only one way to get there and the path will be very dangerous but your devotion and determination for your family remains unwavering. You then set out on a quest for that ultimate hope. Time is running out, will you make it?

Kill, collect and explore different parts of the world to find a cure for your sister!
